Actions.Text: REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES
REFERRED TO MENTAL HEALTH AND DEVELOPMENTAL DISABILITIES

Title: Relates to increasing the frequency that visitation or inspections of facilities operated or licensed by the office for people with developmental disabilities must be made each year
Summary: Increases the frequency that visitation or inspections of facilities operated or licensed by the office for people with developmental disabilities must be made each year.
LawCode: Amd ยง16.11, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to increasing the frequency of visitation and inspection of facilities per year
